K06D0029_H0030:265b-1: a'arya pra dzny'a pa ra mi t'a badzra p'a ni ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K06D0029_H0030:265b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
K06D0029_H0030:265b-4: lag na rdo rje'i mdo theg pa chen po; sangs
K06D0029_H0030:265b-5: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
K06D0029_H0030:265b-6: 'tshal lo // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K06D0029_H0030:265b-7: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bzhugs te /
K06D0029_H0030:265b-8: de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' lag na
K06D0029_H0030:265b-9: rdo rje 'dug pa stan las langs nas bcom ldan
K06D0029_H0030:265b-12: byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi /
K06D0029_H0030:265b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06D0029_H0030:265b-15: byang chub sems dpas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-3: gzhan yang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad rang
K06D0029_H0030:266a-4: bzhin ma mchis pa dang; mtshan ma ma mchis pa
K06D0029_H0030:266a-5: dang / dngos po dang bral ba dang /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-8: nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa stong
K06D0029_H0030:266a-9: pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab kyi pha rol
K06D0029_H0030:266a-10: tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di no /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-13: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum ste /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-14: rig pa chen po'i sngags kyi tshig ni /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-18: ma h'a mu na ye sv'ah'a /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-19: su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed na /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-20: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos rnams gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-21: de skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-22: mi khom pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-23: bsod nams kyi 'bras bu tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang dus rtag tu 'grogs par 'gyur ro //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-25: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K06D0029_H0030:266a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-27: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang /
K06D0029_H0030:266a-31: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom
K06D0029_H0030:266b-0: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par @266b bstod
K06D0029_H0030:266b-1: do // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
